concept.title: Release 11.5.3
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.5.3 includes the following new features.

ul.li: New meetings toolbar - We've added a custom toolbar in meetings where the user can raise their hand, mute, and unmute audio, start and stop their video camera, leave the meeting, and open the new menu.

Updated meetings menu - When you tap the menu button on the toolbar you can now copy the meeting URL to the clipboard, select your sound device, toggle the device camera and enable or disable audio-only mode. If you are an owner or moderator in the meeting you can managed settings and end the meeting for all.

Manage meeting settings - If you are the owner of a meeting, you can now open settings while in the meeting to set or update the meeting password. You can also change the moderated setting as well as change whether or not guests are allowed to join your meeting.
